doc:
Jefferson Machamer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jefferson_Machamer 0 Thomas Jefferson Machamer (1900 – August 15, 1960) was an American cartoonist and illustrator known especially for his drawings of glamorous women. He also wrote and acted in a series of short comedy films in the 1930s. Thomas_Jefferson_Machamer ( 1900 – August_15_,_1960 ) was an_American_cartoonist_and_illustrator_known especially for his_drawings of glamorous_women . He also wrote and acted in a_series of short_comedy_films in the_1930s .
